spell_tooltip.description:
Heals the target for 1.2 million over 6 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Heals the target for 1.2 million over 6 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Kick upwards, dealing 411,526 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Kick upwards, dealing 413,868 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Reduces all damage taken by you and your target while channeling Soothing Mists by 6%.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 6%.
Detox additionally removes all Poison and Disease effects.
Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 20%.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 15 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 10 sec.

Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 341,545 Nature damage to all enemies, and 380,543 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Increases the range of Leg Sweep by 4 yds.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Reduces magic damage you take by 60% for 6 sec, and transfers all currently active harmful magical effects on you back to their original caster if possible.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 30% and reducing all damage you take by 30%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Your physical damage taken is reduced by 10% and an additional 10% every 4 sec until you receive a physical attack.
When your healing spells heal an ally whose health is below 35% maximum health, you gain an additional 10% healing for the next 4 sec.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 30%, based on your missing health.
Increases your maximum health by an additional 10% and your damage taken is reduced by an additional 10% while Fortifying Brew is active.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 40% for 6 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.
Roll causes you to become lighter than air, allowing you to double jump to dash forward a short distance once within 5 sec, but the cooldown of Roll is increased by 2 sec.

You gain a bonus effect based on your current health.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.

Wraps the target in healing mists, healing for 541,974 over 7 sec, and increasing healing received from your other spells by 40%. 

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.

Receive a jolt of energy, empowering your next spell cast:

Enveloping Mist: Immediately heals for 352,158 and is instant cast.
Renewing Mist: Duration increased by 10 sec.
Vivify: No mana cost.
Rising Sun Kick: Cooldown reduced by 9 sec.
Expel Harm: Transfers 25% additional healing into damage and creates a Chi Cocoon absorbing 1.5 million damage.

Surrounds the target with healing mists, restoring 292,605 health over 20 sec.

If Renewing Mist heals a target past maximum health, it will travel to another injured ally within 20 yds.

Encases the target in a cocoon of Chi energy for 12 sec, absorbing 4.6 million damage and increasing all healing over time received by 50%.

Applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

For every 250,000 Mana you spend, you gain 1 stack of Mana Tea, with a chance equal to your critical strike chance to generate 1 extra stack.

Mana Tea:
Consumes 1 stack of Mana Tea per 0.4 sec to restore 44,625 Mana and reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 30% for 1.00 sec per stack of Mana Tea consumed after drinking.

Can be cast while moving, but movement speed is reduced by 40% while channeling.
Vivify heals all allies with your Renewing Mist active for 139,595, reduced beyond 5 allies.

Rising Sun Kick now kicks up a Gust of Mist to heal 2 allies within 40 yds for 144,436. 

Spinning Crane Kick and Blackout Kick have a chance to kick up a Gust of Mist to heal 1 ally within 40 yds for 143,637.

Heals all party and raid members within 40 yds for 1.7 million and clears them of 3 harmful Magic, all Poison, and all Disease effects.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
The absorb amount of Life Cocoon is increased by 80%.

Renewing Mist's heal over time has a chance to cause your next Vivify to also trigger a Zen Pulse on its target and all allies with Renewing Mist, healing them for 181,471 increased by 6% per Renewing Mist active, up to 30%.
Life Cocoon applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

Summon an effigy of Chi-Ji for 12 sec that kicks up 3 Gust of Mists when you Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, or Spinning Crane Kick, healing up to 2 allies for 138,914, and reducing the cost and cast time of your next Enveloping Mist by 33%, stacking.

Chi-Ji's presence makes you immune to movement impairing effects.
After you fully consume Thunder Focus Tea, your next Vivify triggers Zen Pulse.
Rising Sun Kick and Enveloping Mist apply Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.
Reduces the cooldown of Life Cocoon by 45 sec.
Increases Enveloping Mist's duration by 1 sec and its healing bonus by 10%.

While active, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji heal up to 5 nearby targets with Enveloping Breath when you cast Enveloping Mist, healing for 178,226 over 7 sec, and increasing the healing they receive from you by 10%.

When activated, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji apply Chi Cocoons to 5 targets within 40 yds, absorbing 1.1 million damage for 10 sec.
Renewing Mist increases its target's healing received from you by 50% for the first 8 sec of its duration, but cannot jump to a new target during this time.

Draws in all nearby clouds of mist, healing the friendly target and up to 4 nearby allies for 155,184 per cloud absorbed.

A cloud of mist is generated every 4 sec while in combat.

Strike the ground fiercely to expose a path of jade for 30 sec, dealing 90,776 Nature damage to up to 5 enemies, and restoring 189,017 health to up to 5 allies within 30 yds caught in the path.

Your abilities have a 6% chance of resetting the cooldown of Jadefire Stomp while fighting within the path.
Reduces the cooldown of Invoke Chi-Ji, the Red Crane by 1 min, but decreases its duration to 12 sec.
Casting Thunder Focus Tea increases your next Crackling Jade Lightning's damage by 2,000% and causes it to chain to 4 additional enemies at 25% effectiveness.

Your abilities reset Jadefire Stomp 100% more often. While within Jadefire Stomp, your Tiger Palms strike twice, your Blackout Kicks strike an additional 2 targets at 20% effectiveness, and your Spinning Crane Kick heals 3 nearby allies for 120% of the damage done.

After casting Jadefire Stomp or Thunder Focus Tea, Ancient Teachings transfers an additional 215% damage to healing for 15 sec.

While Jadefire Teachings is active, your Stamina is increased by 5%.

After using Thunder Focus Tea, your next spell gives 15% of a stat for 10 sec:
Enveloping Mist: Critical strike
Renewing Mist: Haste
Vivify: Mastery
Rising Sun Kick: Versatility
Expel Harm: Versatility
Increases Sheilun's Gift cloud of mist generation to every 4 sec.
Rising Sun Kick heals all allies with your Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist for 26,772, and extends those effects by 4 sec, up to 100% of their original duration.
Sheilun's Gift heals 2 additional allies and its cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec.

Store vitality from 10% of your damage dealt and 30% of your healing. Vitality stored from overhealing is reduced.

For 10 sec after casting Thunder Focus Tea your spells and abilities draw upon the stored vitality to deal 40% additional healing over 8 sec.
Chi Burst and Chi Wave deal 50% increased damage and healing.
During Aspect of Harmony, Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm also withdraw vitality to damage enemies for an additional 20% over 8 sec.
Casting a Physical spell or ability increases the damage and healing of your next Fire or Nature spell or ability by 3%, and vice versa. Stacks up to 5.
Tiger's Lust grants 20% movement speed to up to 2 allies near its target.
Thunder Focus Tea has 1 additional charge.
When cast on yourself, your single-target healing spells heal for 10% more and restore an additional 167,505 health over 6 sec.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm deal 5% additional damage to enemies in a line in front of you. Damage reduced above 5 targets.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm contribute 30% additional vitality.
Casting Vivify stores 102,262 vitality, increased based on your recent Gusts of Mist.

When Aspect of Harmony deals damage or heals, it has a chance to spread to a nearby target. When you directly attack or heal an affected target, it has a chance to intensify.

Targets damaged or healed by your Aspect of Harmony take 20% increased damage or healing from you.

Heals the target for 1.2 million over 6 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Kick upwards, dealing 410,152 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.

Kick upwards, dealing 418,389 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Reduces all damage taken by 6%.
Vivify healing is increased by 40%.
Detox additionally removes all Poison and Disease effects.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 20%.
Increases all damage dealt by 4%.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 15 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 10 sec.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.

Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 349,671 Nature damage to all enemies, and 379,654 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Expel Harm's critical healing is increased by 15%.
Reduces magic damage you take by 60% for 6 sec, and transfers all currently active harmful magical effects on you back to their original caster if possible.
Tiger Palm also applies Eye of the Tiger, dealing 23,371 Nature damage to the enemy and 22,472 healing to the Monk over 8 sec. Limit 1 target.
Reduces all damage you take by 20% to 50% for 10 sec, with larger attacks being reduced by more.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.
Your attacks have a chance to resonate, dealing 12,443 Nature damage to enemies within 8 yds.
Summons a White Tiger Statue at the target location for 10 sec, pulsing 55,303 damage to all enemies every 2 sec for 10 sec.

Wraps the target in healing mists, healing for 541,974 over 7 sec, and increasing healing received from your other spells by 40%. 

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.

Surrounds the target with healing mists, restoring 292,605 health over 20 sec.

If Renewing Mist heals a target past maximum health, it will travel to another injured ally within 20 yds.

Encases the target in a cocoon of Chi energy for 12 sec, absorbing 4.6 million damage and increasing all healing over time received by 50%.

Applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

Receive a jolt of energy, empowering your next spell cast:

Enveloping Mist: Immediately heals for 347,591 and is instant cast.
Renewing Mist: Duration increased by 10 sec.
Vivify: No mana cost.
Rising Sun Kick: Cooldown reduced by 9 sec.
Expel Harm: Transfers 25% additional healing into damage and creates a Chi Cocoon absorbing 1.5 million damage.

For every 250,000 Mana you spend, you gain 1 stack of Mana Tea, with a chance equal to your critical strike chance to generate 1 extra stack.

Mana Tea:
Consumes 1 stack of Mana Tea per 0.4 sec to restore 44,625 Mana and reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 30% for 1.00 sec per stack of Mana Tea consumed after drinking.

Can be cast while moving, but movement speed is reduced by 40% while channeling.

Tiger Palm causes your next Blackout Kick to strike an additional time, stacking up to 4.

Blackout Kick has a 20% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Rising Sun Kick.

Heals all party and raid members within 40 yds for 1.6 million and clears them of 3 harmful Magic, all Poison, and all Disease effects.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Vivify heals all allies with your Renewing Mist active for 135,808, reduced beyond 5 allies.
Vivify critical strikes and Rising Sun Kicks reduce the remaining cooldown on Revival by 1 sec, and Revival heals targets for 15% of Revival's heal over 10 sec.

Renewing Mist's heal over time has a chance to cause your next Vivify to also trigger a Zen Pulse on its target and all allies with Renewing Mist, healing them for 181,469 increased by 6% per Renewing Mist active, up to 30%.
Life Cocoon applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

Summon an effigy of Chi-Ji for 12 sec that kicks up 3 Gust of Mists when you Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, or Spinning Crane Kick, healing up to 2 allies for 145,363, and reducing the cost and cast time of your next Enveloping Mist by 33%, stacking.

Chi-Ji's presence makes you immune to movement impairing effects.
Zen Pulse triggers a second time at 80% effectiveness if cast on targets with Enveloping Mist.
Rising Sun Kick and Enveloping Mist apply Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.
While channeling Mana Tea you exhale the breath of Yu'lon, healing up to 5 allies within 15 yards for 51,524 every 0.4 sec.

While active, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji heal up to 5 nearby targets with Enveloping Breath when you cast Enveloping Mist, healing for 178,226 over 7 sec, and increasing the healing they receive from you by 10%.

When activated, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji apply Chi Cocoons to 5 targets within 40 yds, absorbing 1.1 million damage for 10 sec.

Vivify has a 20% chance to cause your next Rising Sun Kick or Enveloping Mist to generate 1 stack of Mana Tea.

Enveloping Mist and Rising Sun Kick have a 20% chance to cause your next Vivify to generate 1 stack of Mana Tea.

Strike the ground fiercely to expose a path of jade for 30 sec, dealing 90,939 Nature damage to up to 5 enemies, and restoring 188,891 health to up to 5 allies within 30 yds caught in the path.

Your abilities have a 6% chance of resetting the cooldown of Jadefire Stomp while fighting within the path.
Your Tiger Palm, Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, and Crackling Jade Lightning heal up to 5 injured allies within 40 yds for 30% of the damage done, split evenly among them.
Reduces the cooldown of Invoke Chi-Ji, the Red Crane by 1 min, but decreases its duration to 12 sec.
Your Blackout Kicks strike 3 targets and have an additional 10% chance to reset the cooldown of your Rising Sun Kick while within your Jadefire Stomp.

Your abilities reset Jadefire Stomp 100% more often. While within Jadefire Stomp, your Tiger Palms strike twice, your Blackout Kicks strike an additional 2 targets at 20% effectiveness, and your Spinning Crane Kick heals 3 nearby allies for 120% of the damage done.

Heals the target for 1.2 million over 6 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Kick upwards, dealing 420,635 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.

Kick upwards, dealing 417,610 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Reduces all damage taken by 6%.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Increases all damage dealt by 4%.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 15 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 10 sec.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 30% and reducing all damage you take by 30%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.

Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 355,053 Nature damage to all enemies, and 380,839 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Expel Harm's critical healing is increased by 15%.
Reduces magic damage you take by 60% for 6 sec, and transfers all currently active harmful magical effects on you back to their original caster if possible.
Tiger Palm also applies Eye of the Tiger, dealing 23,371 Nature damage to the enemy and 22,472 healing to the Monk over 8 sec. Limit 1 target.
Reduces all damage you take by 20% to 50% for 10 sec, with larger attacks being reduced by more.
Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
You and your allies within 10 yards have 8% increased healing taken from all sources.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.
You and your allies within 10 yards take 4% reduced damage from area-of-effect attacks.
Your attacks have a chance to resonate, dealing 12,443 Nature damage to enemies within 8 yds.
Summons a White Tiger Statue at the target location for 10 sec, pulsing 55,303 damage to all enemies every 2 sec for 10 sec.

Pummels all targets in front of you, dealing 572,390 Physical damage to your primary target and 309,091 damage to all other enemies over 3 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Can be channeled while moving.
Absorbs all damage taken for 10 sec, up to 50% of your maximum health, and redirects 70% of that amount to the enemy target as Nature damage over 6 sec.
Increases your maximum Chi by 1, maximum Energy by 20, and your Energy regeneration by 10%.

While out of combat, your Chi balances to 2 instead of depleting to empty.

Every 15 sec, your next Tiger Palm also casts Expel Harm and deals 30% additional damage.

 Expel Harm
Expel negative chi from your body, healing for 1 million and dealing 25% of the amount healed as Nature damage to an enemy within 20 yards.
Spinning Crane Kick radius increased by 15%.
Fists of Fury damage increased by 20%.
Fists of Fury damage increased by 15%. When Fists of Fury deals damage, it has a 5% chance to refund 1 Chi.

Spinning Crane Kick's damage is increased by 18% for each unique target you've struck in the last 20 sec with Tiger Palm, Blackout Kick, or Rising Sun Kick. 

Stacks up to 5 times and only applies to the primary target of each effect.

Soar forward through the air at high speed for 1.5 sec.
 
If used again while active, you will land, reducing the movement speed of enemies within 8 yds by 70% for 4 sec.
Rising Sun Kick has a chance equal to 100% of your haste to trigger a second time, dealing 290,509 Physical damage and restoring 1 Chi.
Blackout Kick damage increased by 10% and strikes an additional 2 targets at 80% effectiveness.

Split into 3 elemental spirits for 15 sec, each spirit dealing 40% of normal damage and healing.

You directly control the Storm spirit, while Earth and Fire spirits mimic your attacks on nearby enemies.

While active, casting Storm, Earth, and Fire again will cause the spirits to fixate on your target.

When you Combo Strike, the cooldown of Touch of Death is reduced by 0.60 sec.

Touch of Death deals an additional 15% damage.
Strike with both fists at all enemies in front of you, dealing 406,397 Physical damage and reducing movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.
Spending Chi has a chance to make your next Spinning Crane Kick free and deal an additional 200% damage.
The duration of Storm, Earth, and Fire is extended by 0.25 sec for every Chi you spend.
Each successive attack that triggers Combo Strikes in a row grants 1% increased damage, stacking up to 5 times.
Touch of Death deals 20% increased damage and can be used a second time within 5 sec before its cooldown is triggered.
Summons an effigy of Xuen, the White Tiger for 7 sec. Xuen attacks your primary target, and strikes 3 enemies within 10 yards every 0.8 sec with Tiger Lightning for 28,650 Nature damage.

Tiger Palm causes your next Blackout Kick to strike an additional time, stacking up to 4.

Blackout Kick has a 20% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Rising Sun Kick.

Strike of the Windlord grants you 4 stacks of Thunderfist and an additional stack for each additional enemy struck. 

Thunderfist discharges upon melee strikes, dealing 133,557 Nature damage.
Invoke Xuen, the White Tiger's damage is increased by 30% and its cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Your Combo Strikes grant a stacking 1% chance for your next Fists of Fury to grant 3% critical strike, haste, and mastery and invoke Xuen, The White Tiger for 10 sec.
Xuen strikes your enemies with Empowered Tiger Lightning every 4 sec, dealing 8% of the damage you and your summons have dealt to those targets in the last 4 sec.
Touch of Death strikes up to 4 additional nearby targets. This Touch of Death is always an Improved Touch of Death.

Rising Sun Kick critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Fists of Fury by 4 sec.

When Fists of Fury ends, the critical strike chance of Rising Sun Kick is increased by 40% for 5 sec.
Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick increase damage dealt by your next Fists of Fury by 3%, stacking up to 10 times.
Tiger Palm also applies an effect which increases your critical strike chance by 15% for 6 sec on the target. This effect cannot be applied more than once every 30 sec per target.
You gain 20% haste for 8 sec after summoning your Celestial.
